name: Everard 8' Linen Sofa - Natural
description: The Everard has an extremely inviting appearance with slender arms, a solid base and plump down-filled cushions. This eight foot sofa is supported by eight-way hand-tied springs for flexibility and comfort, and though it appears to feature a fixed cover, it actually benefits from a slipcover which can be removed for ease of washing. The basketweave linen has a textural finish that bridges the gap between a smart and organic aesthetic.
